title: Brooklyn Beckham's mystery new girlfriend unmasked as Natalie Ganzhorn
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Brooklyn Beckham has proved he is well and truly over his ex-girlfriend Hana Cross as he has quickly moved on to rising star Natalie Ganzhorn.

The son of Victoria and David , 20, was seen partying with the gorgeous blonde Canadian, 21, at a swanky Beverly Hills party over the weekend.

News of Brooklyn's suspected new flame comes after the star was reportedly dating 27-year-old Phoebe Torrance, who used to work as a Victoria Beckham lookalike.

Brooklyn's rumoured new romance with Natalie has set tongues wagging, since it has been just days since he was caught cosying up to Phoebe.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Brooklyn's new love interest Natalie is best known for playing Heather in popular Canadian comedy series Make It Pop until 2016.

The stunning rising star also boasts a huge social media fanbase and regularly updates her followers with enviable snaps which reveal an insight to her glamorous LA lifestyle.

Natalie's 42K followers have also watched the actress star in TV series The Stanley Dynamic.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Dave Benett/Getty Images for Age)

Brooklyn was recently spotted partying with Phoebe, who is five years his senior, at the launch party of London's The Wellington Restaurant & Club.

It was reported that he had his arm around her and they were glued to each other's side all night.

According to recent speculation, the genetically blessed pair have been dating for the last few months.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The news of Brooklyn's rumoured interest in both Natalie and Phoebe comes following his high-profile split from model Hana Cross.

The former couple ended their nine month romance this summer after several public bust-ups, including one over dinner in Beverly Hills in April.

The pair showed off their relationship on social media while they were together, but unfollowed each other on Instagram when they split.

Parents Victoria and David were said to be "seriously frustrated" by the negative attention that their rows created.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In March, the pair had been to watch Yungblud perform together in London, where they ended up having another barney.

They were also pictured looking tearful outside a restaurant in LA as they had an emotional argument.

Security even had to separate them at the Cannes Film Festival after Hana reportedly lashed out at Brooklyn.
description: Brooklyn's new mystery girl has been revealed as stunning Canadian actress Natalie Ganzhorn
authors: Dave Benett Getty Images For Age
